attributes.action: Hold referendums on petitions with enough signatures to vote on whether to make them laws
attributes.additional_details: I propose that if a group or person can get a designated number of signatures on a petition for a new law that they are proposing, that the government must initiate a national referendum for the public to vote on whether the proposed law should become law or not. The public – the people – should have the right to make their own laws on what they want.
